description: [``botocore``] Amazon SageMaker Autopilot now supports 1) feature importance reports for AutoML jobs and 2) PartialFailures for AutoML jobs
[``botocore``] Adding support to push SSH keys to the EC2 serial console in order to allow an SSH connection to your Amazon EC2 instance's serial port.
[``botocore``] Update cloudwatch client to latest version

[``botocore``] This SDK release adds two new dataset features: 1) support for specifying a database connection as a dataset input 2) support for dynamic datasets that accept configurable parameters in S3 path.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for Batch Predictions in Amazon Fraud Detector.

[``botocore``] ReplaceRootVolume feature enables customers to replace the EBS root volume of a running instance to a previously known state. Add support to grant account-level access to the EC2 serial console
[``botocore``] Adding new APIs to support ConformancePack Compliance CI in Aggregators
[``botocore``] Added support for journey pause/resume, journey updatable import segment and journey quiet time wait.
